data.text: @kdurquiza @POTUS @MarkedByCovid At this point- a moment of silence is empty for me. I want ACTUAL action. I want real public health mitigation. I want global vaccines, the Global Fund for Pandemic Prevention funded, #LongCovid to be acknowledged and funding for medical care plus financial help for those with it

@kdurquiza @POTUS @MarkedByCovid Hopefully he does. Then #Covidkim from my state of Iowa will speak. She will tell you how great she handled it. She allowed it to run rampant killing people including my dad. She misused funds, kept information from us, no mask mandate, took unemployment  away, and so much more.
